graph hanoi
{
000 -> 001(101),002(102);
001 -> 000(110),002(112),021(202);
010 -> 011(101),012(102),020(212);
011 -> 010(110),012(112),211(302);
002 -> 000(120),001(121),012(201);
020 -> 010(221),021(110),022(120);
022 -> 122(301),020(102),021(121);
021 -> 001(220),020(101),022(112);
012 -> 002(210),010(120),011(121);
100 -> 101(101),102(102),200(312);
101 -> 100(110),102(120),121(220);
110 -> 111(101),112(102),120(212);
111 -> 110(110),112(112);
102 -> 100(120),101(102),112(201);
120 -> 110(221),121(112),122(102);
122 -> 022(310),120(120),121(121);
121 -> 101(202),120(121),122(112);
112 -> 102(210),110(120),111(121);
200 -> 100(321),201(101),202(102);
201 -> 200(110),202(101),221(202);
210 -> 211(101),212(102),220(221);
211 -> 011(320),210(110),212(112);
202 -> 200(120),201(110),212(201);
220 -> 210(212),221(101),222(102);
222 -> 220(120),221(121);
221 -> 201(220),220(110),222(112);
212 -> 202(210),210(120),211(121);
}
